mapper.select: select a0.* ,a1.id AS creator,a1.USERNAME AS creatorName from admins a0,admins a1 where a0.id =#{id} AND a0.creator = a1.ID(+)
SELECT r.* FROM ADMINS_ROLES ar,ROLES r WHERE ar.ADMin =#{value} AND ar.ROLE= r.ID and r.status =1

SELECT DISTINCT(p.id),p.* FROM ( SELECT r.* FROM ADMINS_ROLES ar,ROLES r WHERE ar.ADMin =#{value} AND ar.ROLE= r.ID and r.status =1 ) t,ROLES_PERMISSIONS rp,PERMISSIONS p WHERE t.ID = rp.ROLE AND p.ID = rp.PERMISSION and p.status=1

SELECT r0.*,t0.granttime FROM ROLES r0, ( SELECT r.ID,ar.GRANTTIME FROM ROLES r,ADMINS_ROLES ar WHERE r.ID = ar.ROLE(+) AND ar.admin = #{id} AND r.STATUS != -1 ) t0 WHERE r0.ID = t0.id(+)
ORDER BY ${sort} ${order}
